text: The law of the District shall govern:

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 106 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-801.06

sections.text: The internal affairs of a limited liability company; and
The liability of a member as member and a manager as manager for the debts, obligations, or other liabilities of a limited liability company.
